During our first PAM-Team Openscapes (Fall 2024), we developed methods to create individual lab manuals (for each science center), and link them to a National NMFS PAM Lab Manual.

1. [Getting Started](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-OpenScience/content/gettingStarted.html){target="_blank"}
2. [Organize with Yaml](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-OpenScience/content/organizeYml.html){target="_blank"}
3. [Create Content](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-OpenScience/content/createContent.html){target="_blank"}
4. [Github Collaboration](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-OpenScience/content/gitCollaborate.html){target="_blank"}, including: [Issues](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-OpenScience/content/issues.html){target="_blank"}, [Projects](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-OpenScience/content/gitProject.html){target="_blank"}, and [Discussions](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM-OpenScience/content/gitDiscussions.html){target="_blank"}
